text:
Hi <@U26BLKGE4>
I didnâ€™t quite get your opinion on this one, is it best to pull down a new boilerplate for each module, _*or*_ use the hs create module to keep the modules in the same project?
Thank you!
ah, my bad, I misread your original post. Yes, use boilerplate for new React modules, in my opinion, and then bundle them in your production project folder when they are built
